text: []https://www.oneplace.com/ministries/truth-for-life/ Good News in a Bad News World (Part 1 of 2) May 25, 2024 00:00 Naaman had wealth, power, and prestige. Yet all his success was overshadowed by leprosy and the inability to cure himself. Hear Naaman’s story, and discover how each of us faces a similar dilemma. That’s our focus on Truth For Life with Alistair Begg. 2 Kings 5:1–14 References: 2 Kings 5:1-14 Featured Offer []https://www.oneplace.com/r?oid=32352&sid=163&acid=2 Parenting Essentials By: Andreas Kostenberger and Margaret Kostenberger - There’s no shortage of books on parenting! We carefully selected Parenting Essentials because it does an excellent job guiding couples through important discussions about discipline, child friendships, dealing with conflict, and even handling parent exhaustion ahead of time, before parents find themselves in the midst of difficulty. Parenting Essentials addresses more than a dozen key areas of parenting and helps couples create a framework around a united philosophy for raising Christian children. This is a helpful book if you’re a young parent or have children navigating parenthood.
